text: over the years I got to be quite a kind
of syrup so my personal preferences for
Lux but I found Palmolive had a nice
peacock after dinner flavor heady but
with just a touch of mellow smoothness
life boy on the other hand
you ready to tell me
[Music]
all right where did you hear that word
now I had heard that word at least 10
times a day for my old man my father
worked in profanity the way other
artists might work in oils or clay it
was his true medium a master but I
chickened out and I blurted out the
first name that came to mind oh

he said
